title: Moon sighting body to meet on Sunday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 30 (APP): The Central Ruet-e-Hilal Committee will meet on Sunday for sighting the crescent of Shawal 1443 AH in the Ministry of Religious Affairs and Interfaith Harmony.
The zonal and district Ruet-e-Hilal Committeesâ€™ meetings would be held at their respective headquarters in the meantime, said a ministry press release on Saturday.
Ruet-e-Hilal Committee Chairman Maulana Syed Abdul Khabir Azad would announce the final decision about crescent sighting or otherwise subsequently on the basis of information received to that end.
